entry.title: Monday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending after midnight then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 late this evening. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 11. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 11. Wind chill near minus 22. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 20 in the evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 27 February 2023
